1425380.name: 10mg :)
1425380.description:
10mg is a collection of 10 minute long games.

:) is a series of tiny games based on well-known classics and immediately recognizable mechanics. Each game is connected to the next, and has a unique win condition you must figure out for yourself.

Gameplay features

  • Bounce a ball
  • Race tiny cars
  • Hit a golf ball
  • Connect a series of pipes
  • Uncover mines
  • Eat fruit
  • Pop colorful bubbles
  • ???

Supports all control schemes (mouse, keyboard, gamepad), but most of the game is easiest with the mouse.

game by torcado
audio by Bibiki

:)
